column1: prompt
Explain why it is important to have an emergency plan.

Provide a 3-5 sentence summary of the following article: A new study has found that sea levels are rising faster than previously estimated, due to melting ice sheets in Greenland and Antarctica calling into question how much time we have to respond to climate change. The results, published in Nature, show that since 1992, sea levels have risen an average of 3.2 millimeters per year, significantly higher than the previous estimates of 2.8 millimeters. To calculate this number, the researchers used satellite data that more accurately measures the rising levels than ever before. The melting ice sheets, which together account for 75 percent of all the ice loss, have caused the situation to be worse than previously estimated.

Given a story, pick out specific details and create an outline Once upon a time, there was a brave knight who set off on a quest to find the magical relic known as the Chalice of Life. He traveled to distant lands, bravely faced many dangerous creatures, and encountered numerous powerful magic users. Though his journey was long and arduous, the knight eventually found the Chalice of Life deep in a forgotten temple.
